Anduin.name: Flash Heal
Anduin.description: Cast for 0.75 seconds to heal an allied Hero for 260 (+4% per level).

Anduin.name: Divine Star
Anduin.description: Send light that deals 140 (+4% per level) damage to enemies and then returns to Anduin, healing allied Heroes for 130 (+4% per level) in a wider path. Healing increases by 25% per enemy Hero hit.

Anduin.name: Chastise
Anduin.description: Shove a swell of light forward, dealing 155 (+4% per level) damage to the first enemy Hero hit and Rooting them for 1.25 seconds.

Anduin.name: Holy Word: Salvation
Anduin.description: After 0.5 seconds, Channel to invoke the Light for 3 seconds. While nearby, allied Heroes heal for up to 25% of their max Health and are Protected.

Anduin.name: Lightbomb
Anduin.description: Imbue an allied Hero with the Light. After 1.5 seconds, it explodes, dealing 150 (+4% per level) damage to enemies and Stunning them for 1.25 seconds.  The target gains a Shield that absorbs 165 (+4% per level) damage per enemy Hero hit. Lasts for 5 seconds.

Anduin.name: Leap of Faith
Anduin.description: Faith instantly pulls an allied Hero to Anduin's location, granting them Unstoppable while they travel.

1.name: Renew
1.description: Basic Attacks against Heroes empower the next Flash Heal to also heal for 130 (+4% per level) over 5 seconds.

1.name: Pursued by Grace
1.description: Damaging an enemy Hero heals the lowest Health allied Hero near Anduin for 35 (+4% per level).

1.name: Bold Strategy
1.description: Anduin gains his other level 1 Talents, but Flash Heal's cooldown is increased by 2 seconds.

4.name: Moral Compass
4.description: Divine Star fires Basic Attacks at 2 Heroes close to its apex for 70% damage.

4.name: Holy Reach
4.description: Increase the Root duration of Chastise from 1.25 to 1.5 seconds.  After hitting an enemy with Chastise, Anduin's next Basic Attack deals 75% more damage and heals allied Heroes near him for 100 (+4% per level).

4.name: Inner Fire
4.description: Increases Attack Speed by 20% and Basic Attack range by 15%.

7.name: Binding Heal
7.description: Casting Flash Heal on an ally heals Anduin for 115 (+4% per level).

7.name: Power Word: Shield
7.description: If Divine Star hits an enemy Hero, gain a Shield that absorbs 185 (+4% per level) damage for 4 seconds.

7.name: Blessed Recovery
7.description: If Anduin loses more than 8% of his maximum Health at once, recover 15% Health over 3 seconds.  This effect has a 10 second cooldown.  Current Health required: 133 (+4% per level)

10.name: Holy Word: Salvation
10.description: After 0.5 seconds, Channel to invoke the Light for 3 seconds. While nearby, allied Heroes heal for up to 25% of their max Health and are Protected.

10.name: Lightbomb
10.description: Imbue an allied Hero with the Light. After 1.5 seconds, it explodes, dealing 150 (+4% per level) damage to enemies and Stunning them for 1.25 seconds.  The target gains a Shield that absorbs 165 (+4% per level) damage per enemy Hero hit. Lasts for 5 seconds.

13.name: Speed of the Pious
13.description: While Divine Star is traveling, gain 30% Movement Speed.  Each allied Hero healed by Divine Star on its return to Anduin reduces its cooldown by 1 second.

13.name: Push Forward!
13.description: Damaging an enemy Hero grants 2.5% Movement Speed for 6 seconds, up to 20%.  While gaining 20% Movement Speed, Chastise's cooldown recharges 25% faster.

13.name: Enchant Boots - Lion's Speed
13.description: Gain 5% Movement Speed. This bonus is quadrupled while Leap of Faith's cooldown is available.  Allies pulled by Leap of Faith are healed for 280 (+4% per level) over 4 seconds.

16.name: Evenhanded Blessings
16.description: If Flash Heal is cast on a different target from its last, increase its healing by 20% and  refund 50% of its cooldown.

16.name: Holy Nova
16.description: After Anduin catches Divine Star, it explodes, healing nearby allied Heroes for 105 (+4% per level) and damaging enemies for 105 (+4% per level).

16.name: Inner Focus
16.description: Activate to reset the cooldown of Flash Heal and its next cast heals for 40% more.  Damaging enemy Heroes with Divine Star reduces this cooldown by 8 seconds.

16.name: Lightwell
16.description: Summon a Lightwell that periodically heals a nearby allied Hero for 75 (+4% per level). The well only fades after healing 10 times or when recast.  This cooldown is reduced by 1 second each time Anduin heals an allied Hero.

20.name: Light of Stormwind
20.description: Holy Word: Salvation grants allied Heroes Invulnerability instead of Protected. This does not affect Anduin.

20.name: Glyph of Faith
20.description: Leap of Faith gains a 2nd charge.

20.name: Varian's Legacy
20.description: Basic Attacks burn enemies for 87 (+4% per level) damage over 3 seconds and Anduin heals for 50% of the damage dealt.

20.name: Desperate Prayer
20.description: Activate to desperately heal an allied Hero for 540 (+4% per level), but kneel for 2 seconds, unable to act.
